attributes.description:
One of the most popular hatchbacks in South Africa is the Volkswagen CITI Golf. Driving it is simple, cheap, and it costs little to maintain. This is the stock standard Citi.com variant with a low mileage of only 124000km. It has every OEM factory option, including air conditioning, central locking, white cluster dials, Mud flaps, and mag wheels. A JVC font loader radio has been fitted for proffered entertainment. Additionally provided are a spare key and a service history. 

For more information, contact 0835091700 or 0728242534
